# locateip

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/clessn/ipadress/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/clessn/ipadress/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of locateip is to locate IP addresses using [ip-api.com](ip-api.com)

## Installation

You can install the development version of locateip from [GitHub](https://github.com/):

```{r eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("clessn/locateip")
```

## Example

```{r example}
library(locateip)

resp <- locate_ip("142.162.45.64")

resp |>
  httr2::resp_body_string()
```
